com.lib.pygmy

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PygmyGame

    public interface Game
    Encapsulates the game's state and levels

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObservableValue<java.lang.Boolean> endOfGame() 
      PygmyGameContext getContext()
      Returns the current game's global context
      GameLevel getCurrentLevel()
      Returns the current level
      java.lang.String getCurrentPlayerId()
      Returns the current player's ID

      Returns the game's levels
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPlayerIds()
      Returns the IDs of the participant players

      Initializes the game's configuration
      void onPlayerMove(GameMove move)
      Callback method called when a player has made a move
      void setLevels(java.util.List<GameLevel> levels)
      Sets the game's levels
      void setPlayerIds(java.util.List<java.lang.String> playerIds)
      Sets the IDs of the participant players
      void start()
      Starts the game by running the first level
